body:
Hi everyone :)



I get really weird radiation analysis results and I don't understand why... I tried switching to a different epw, cancelled the "type hint" options on all the components (which seemed to be the problem last time), checked the srf dir, switched surfaces (made a new surface and inserted it into GH)... didn't work. 

When I connect a different polysurface from the same Rhino model it does work. Any ideas?
